title: Add more granular cookie management.
body: IE had the best cookie mangement of all browsers. Accept, block, Prompt. 1st, 3rd party. Allow all session cookies. Elegant, simple.

comments.body:
If Microsoft may look at Chromium how cookie handling should be done, or remember how it was done in IE. F12 Tools are a way to repair an incident when a webpage has written a cookie and I am tired of deleting all cookie.
Chromium can block all cookies and allow me to manage webpages that are allowed to set an cookie
Guess why I now switched my default browser to chromium?
